task_name: Kickoff & Discovery: P1. Short Problem Statement
description: Define the core problem the roadmap integration should solve: Users think in goals, not taxonomies; landing page is a giant list without structure, hierarchy, or narrative.
List things not yet known but must validate: Do users prefer paths or graphs? Do advanced learners want personalization?
Define early hypothesis and business outcomes: Faster decision-making, clear starting point, clear next steps for new and existing learners.
Identify basic elements: Course attributes (difficulty, skills gained, duration, domain), skill nodes, relationships (prerequisite_of, etc.), user goal types.
Create a rough sketch of how major learning themes relate: Branching, converging, prerequisites.
Simple list summarizing courses, grouped by IA primitives.

task_name: Research & IA: PE1. Short Heuristic Evaluation
description: Heuristic evaluation of current platform to guide decisions.

task_name: Research & IA: U1. Summary of Learner Types
description: Overview of main learner segments and their goals.

task_name: Research & IA: U2. Pain Points & Needs
description: Key frustrations and what learners are trying to accomplish.

task_name: Research & IA: U3. Decision / Learning Journey Notes
description: How learners currently choose courses and what they struggle with.
Publish the short forum survey (from pm-qa-roadmap.md) and run a 10–20 person pilot.
Early outlines of different roadmap formats: Linear, branching, graph, quiz-based.

task_name: Design Concepts: CW2. Key Insights & Preferences
description: Notes on what resonated, didn’t, and should be explored next.
Short recap for community transparency.
Light sketches or mockups of different roadmap formats.

task_name: Prototype & Validate: PR2. Quick Feedback Round
description: Short, informal input from learners or community.

task_name: Prototype & Validate: PR3. Early Recommendation / Direction
description: Summary of which format(s) should move forward and why.
Description of how the chosen roadmap format should work.
Clean and structured overview of all courses.
Where the roadmap will appear and how learners access it.
Build the interactive Roadmap UI (landing page + course page integration + dashboard entry).
Create course metadata, simple API endpoints, and event tracking.
Add events for time_to_first_enroll, path_start_rate, etc.
Quick wins for immediate navigation fixes.
Feature-flagged rollout, staging demo, and go-live.
Track KPIs, post-launch bug triage, and iterate based on data.

task_name: PM: Create GitHub Project Board & Labels
description: Create a GitHub Project board, `roadmap` and `phase:X` labels, and seed initial issues for P1,P2,P3. Expected output: project board URL, 3 seeded issues, label list.

task_name: PM: Create Issues from Task Template
description: Create GitHub issues for top-level tasks (IA1..IP5) with acceptance criteria and owners. Expected output: issue list linked to project board.
Create a ready-to-post survey message and Google Form export using `pm-qa-roadmap.md`. Expected output: survey text, form link, pilot plan.

task_name: UX: Publish Survey & Recruit Pilot Users
description: Post survey to forum, recruit 10–20 pilot participants, and collect responses. Expected output: survey responses CSV and metadata.
Synthesize pilot results into top insights, quotes, and prioritized unknowns. Expected output: short analysis doc and tags mapped to IA deliverables.
Produce final Figma frames, component specs, and developer-ready assets. Expected output: Figma file link, annotated specs, tokens.
Run accessibility checklist, color contrast, keyboard navigation, and ARIA roles. Expected output: A11y checklist with fixes.
Create a feature-flagged scaffold for the Roadmap component (styling + routing + placeholder data). Expected output: branch with scaffold and feature flag.

task_name: Frontend: Implement UI Interactions & Unit Tests
description: Implement core interactions, state management, and unit tests for components. Expected output: passing unit tests and component PR.
Add Playwright scenarios for roadmap flow (view, start path, view gap). Expected output: passing E2E tests in CI.
Design schema for course metadata and skill tags, write seed scripts for staging. Expected output: schema docs and seed data script.

task_name: Backend: Implement API Endpoints & Unit Tests
description: Implement read endpoints for roadmap data and write unit tests. Expected output: documented endpoints and passing tests.
Define event payloads, send events to analytics, and create a simple KPI dashboard. Expected output: event schema and dashboard link.
Deploy branch to staging, run smoke tests and script-based usability checks. Expected output: staging URL and test results.
Write deployment runbook, rollback plan and release notes for the feature. Expected output: runbook doc and release notes.
Perform a controlled canary rollout to a subset of users, monitor for errors and KPI movement. Expected output: rollout notes and KPI snapshot.
Review KPIs after rollout, create prioritized iteration backlog and assign owners. Expected output: metrics report and backlog of improvements.
example test
